```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
suppressPackageStartupMessages({ library(here); library(dplyr); library(readr); library(ggplot2); library(gt) })

out_tbl <- here("Results","Tables","stage1_ensemble")
out_fig <- here("Results","Figures","stage1_ensemble")
out_data <- here("Data","Processed","stage1_ensemble")

```




```{r load, include=FALSE}

metrics <- readr::read_csv(file.path(out_tbl, "ensemble_metrics.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
metrics %>%
gt::gt() %>%
gt::fmt_number(columns = "rmse", decimals = 2) %>%
gt::tab_header(title = "In-sample RMSE (sanity check)")

```


# Response curve

```{r response curv, include=FALSE}

img_path <- file.path(out_fig, "ensemble_curves.png")
if (file.exists(img_path)) {
knitr::include_graphics(img_path)
} else {
cat("No curve image found at: ", img_path)
}

```
